articles.author: Science X
articles.title: Beetroot juice supplement found to lower blood pressure, improve exercise capacity in people with COPD - Medical Xpress
articles.description: A 12-week course of daily beetroot juice supplement for people with chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD) lowered blood pressure and improved how far patients could walk in six minutes in research published in the European Respiratory Journal.

articles.author: NEWS WIRES
articles.title: Putin says Russia ready to hold talks on the future of Ukraine - FRANCE 24 English
articles.description: President Vladimir Putin said on Tuesday that Russia would be prepared to talk to Ukraine, the United States and Europe about the future of Ukraine if they wanted to, but that Moscow would defend its national interests.
